name: Mjölnir
description: A replica of Mjölnir, the hammer of Thor.  It is rumored to be able to level mountains with a single blow.  It is decorated with gold and silver ornaments.

name: Gungnir
description: A replica of Gungnir, the spear of Odin.  It is rumored to be the perfect spear, perfectly hitting any target regardless of the wielder's strength or skill.  It is decorated with gold and silver ornaments.

name: Laevateinn
description: A replica of Laevateinn, the sword of Freyr.  It is rumored to be able to fight by itself.  It is decorated with gold and silver ornaments.
